title: Who's Who in America
description: Inducted as a Member of the 2024 Class of Marquis Who's Who in America.

title: AWS Certified Solutions Architect - Associate
description: Earners of this certification able to strategically design well-architected distributed systems that are scalable, resilient, efficient, and fault-tolerant.

title: AWS Certified Machine Learning
description: Earners of this certification have demonstrated ability to build, train, tune, and deploy ML models using the AWS Cloud.

title: Certified Kubernetes Application Developer
description: Earners of this designation demonstrate the skills to perform as a Kubernetes Application Developer, defining resources and using core primitives to build, monitor, and troubleshoot scalable applications
